DOC.brief_summary: The patient undergo kidney transplantation randomize one follow two group : Group FK506MR : FK506MR/MMF/steroid ; Group Prograf® : Prograf® /MMF/steroid . The treatment period 3 month ( 12 week )
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Efficacy Safety FK506MR v Prograf® Patients Undergoing Kidney Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent date patient must obtain . Patient 1870 year age receive primary kidney . Female patient must negative pregnancy test prior enrolment . Female patient child bear potential must agree practice effective birth control study . Kidney retransplantation patient receive organ transplantation kidney . PRA > 10 % previous 6 month . Patient need antibody induction therapy . Patient significant liver disease , define continuously elevate > 2 time SGPT and/or SGOT and/or total bilirubin level past 28 day . Patient severe infection require treatment , and/or severe diarrhea , vomit , active upper gastrointestinal tract malabsorption active peptic ulcer . Patient history severe cardiovascular , respiratory disease ; history malignancy . Patient HIV HBsAg positive . Patient allergic Prograf macrolide antibiotic .
